info.title: Defect
info.description: You can read the defect header and detailed description. You can create new instances or update existing instances of a defect.

x-sap-shortText: Read, create, or update data of a defect using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Quality Notification and Defect Processing Integration(SAP_COM_0153)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*
